existing_features.title: Add JobPosting JSON-LD structured data markup (schema.org/JobPosting) to the Careers page so search engines can index job postings. Inject the <script type='application/ld+json'> block into the CareersPage component. Do not modify any other component, page, backend logic, or styling.

new_feature_requests.summary: Locate the phone number '855-755-5005' in the privacy policy content stored in the backend and replace it with '201-838-0000'
Change email from info@supremetruckinggroup.com to contact@supremeltl.com on the privacy page
In the privacy policy content, replace all instances of 'info@supremetruckinggroup.com' with 'contact@supremeltl.com'
On the privacy page, replace 'https://supremetruckinggroup.com' with 'www.supremeltl.com'
In the privacy policy content stored in the backend, replace all instances of 'https://supremetruckinggroup.com' with 'www.supremeltl.com'
Add JobPosting schema (structured data markup) to the site without changing anything else

projectName: Update phone number in privacy policy from 855-755-5005 to 201-838-0000
